name: Mole Mania (itch)
description:
A mole whacking game unlike any other. Test your prowess as you whack moles into oblivion. But wait, these moles don't look like they're enjoying it...

There are two game modes: Story & Endless. In each use a mouse to swing your hammer (preferably at the moles).

In story mode, you will quickly find that something is off, but there is a way to fix it. Find out how if you download Mole Mania.

Play Time: ~10 Minutes

Controls: Mouse and Keyboard (P to pause, Space to continue, etc.)

Credits:

  • Anna Breuker - Programmer
  • Caleb Kahn - Programmer, 2D Art
  • Ian Connors - 3D Art
  • Noah Trillizio - Music / Sound, Programmer
  • Jacob Zydorowicz - Programmer

Assets: 

Circus Tent: Periklis,  Hammer: Open Game Art, Lights: Sagital3D, Mole: Makarevich124, Particle Effects: GAPH
